**Device model**

Full product name (e.g. Thermalright AX120 Digital).

**Diagnostic report**

Run `trcc report` and paste the output:

<details>
<summary>trcc report output</summary>

```
Paste trcc report output here
```

</details>

**Device capabilities**

- [ ] LCD screen (displays images/themes)
- [ ] LED RGB lighting
- [ ] Both
- [ ] Not sure

**Additional context**

- Does this device work in Windows TRCC? Which tab? (FormUSBLCD / FormHID / FormLED)
- Photo of the device (optional, but helpful)
